name: Heirloom (Swynfel)
description:
Attempt at making a game for the Godot Wild Jam 24!

Prototype of a TRPG where you control a family through several generations, with children inheriting equipment from their ancestors.

Plenty of bugs (hopefully no game-crashing ones), the first one being the duplicate history at the beginning.

Theme : Family

Wildcards : WatchMaker

Source code here: https://github.com/Swynfel/heirloom/releases/tag/gwj-fix
